title: This Is A Rare Jewel Caterpillar.
body:
This is called a Jewel Caterpillar. Once thought extinct...

http://i.imgur.com/TvnhUFF.jpg

There were once millions of Jewel Caterpillars which covered the Tuchanka river basin in New Zealand. 

Sadly due to their usefulness in Chinese medicine there are now only a handful left.
